Scripting.Code: function f f = "top=" & cp.doc.getText( "top" ) & ", left=" & cp.doc.getText( "left" ) call cp.visit.setProperty("toolPanelPositionTop", cp.doc.getText( "top" )) call cp.visit.setProperty("toolPanelPositionLeft", cp.doc.getText( "left" )) end function

function m dim name dim value ' name = cp.doc.getProperty("n") value = cp.doc.getProperty("v") if (name="isLockedAccountTab") Then call cp.user.setProperty("isLockedAccountTab",value) end if if (name="tpLoginTabIsPinned") Then m = m & "
hit on tpLoginTabIsPinned
" call cp.user.setProperty("tpLoginTabIsPinned",value) end if m = m & "
n=[" & name & "]
" m = m & "
v=[" & value & "]
" m = m & "
property=[" & cp.user.getProperty("tpLoginTabIsPinned","") & "]
" cp.utils.appendLogfile( m ) end function

Addon.name: Tool Panel

Scripting.Code: function f dim left left = cp.visit.getinteger("toolPanelPositionLeft") left = left & "px" f = "<style>#tpDraggable {left: " & left & ";position: fixed;}</style>" end function

Addon.name: Tool Panel Settings
Addon.FormXML: <Form> <Description>Settings that change features/characteristics of the Tool Panel.</Description> <Help></Help> <HelpLink>http://www.contensive.com</HelpLink> <Tab name="Tool Panel Tabs" heading="Login/Account" description="Settings and Features"> <SiteProperty caption="Show the Login Tab" name="toolPanelShowLoginTab" ReadOnly="0" Type="Boolean" Description="When checked, displays the Login tab at the top of every page.">False</SiteProperty> <SiteProperty caption="Pin New User Login Tab" name="toolPanelPinLoginTab" ReadOnly="0" Type="Boolean" Description="When checked, the state of the Login tab for new users will not auto-hide when not in use and stay locked in the open position.">True</SiteProperty> <SiteProperty caption="Show the Account Tab" name="toolPanelShowAccountTab" ReadOnly="0" Type="Boolean" Description="When checked, displays the Account tab at the top of every page.">False</SiteProperty> <SiteProperty caption="Pin New User Account Tab" name="toolPanelPinAccountTab" ReadOnly="0" Type="Boolean" Description="When checked, the state of the Account tab will not auto-hide when not in use and stay locked in the open position.">True</SiteProperty> </Tab> </Form>
